text: Víctor Manuel Casadesús Castaño, usually just called Víctor (born 28 February 1985 in Palma, Majorca, Balearic Islands), is a Spanish footballer. He plays for RCD Mallorca as a forward. ==International career== Víctor played for Spain at the 2004 UEFA European Under-19 Football Championship. He scored for Spain in the 2–2 semifinal draw (which they won in a penalty shootout) over Ukraine.Spain shine in Switzerland He eventually got into the U-21s. ==Honours== ;Spain U19 *UEFA U-19 Championship: 2004 ==References== ==Other websites== *Mallorca official profile Category:Spanish footballers Category:1985 births Category:Living people
title: Víctor Casadesús
